reviewText: Wonderful, artistically filmed movie. I deducted 1 Star due to the lack of subtitles which makes it difficult for friends to fully appreciate this film. It has, however, encouraged me to 'brush-up' on my Polish language skills. [Part of the interesting aspect of this film is realizing that "Papusza" is/was Polish only by accident: being in Poland when the 'no roaming' laws were enforced. What nationality is a Romani or a Sinti?]
